name: nehru
title: Nehru
desc: A minimalistic theme without bloat and excellent response time, we have a built in tag and archive system we also provide a search which is excellent and built with sound engineering practices.
article:
We have provided the following features:

  • Robots txt and sitemap.
  • Compressed css for better performance


Site features include all the modern and ease of use elements we have come to love and appreciate, like Archive, tags and search.


As I'm just an individual and this is more of a hobby than profession I accept payment through UPI(for Indian users) and PayPal for everyone else.

You would have to email me your transaction id from the payment and after receiving that I will send you the code base that you can use however you see fit. If you need more features added to this or need me it customised for you I am also available for that (the price to be discussed later.)


Price for the theme:


15 USD for international users (Negotiable)

1000 INR for Indian (UPI offer only)


Email:


aoneone5@protonmail.com
